about.description:
zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays
that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also
supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data,
e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and
from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes
Python and Fortran bindings.
about.summary: Library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput read and write random access

name: zfpy
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.5
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: zfpy
    version: 0.5.5
source:
    patches:
        - 100-update-cmake.patch
    sha256: 6a7f4934489087d9c117a4af327fd6495ea757924f4df467b9c537abf8bd86c4
    url: https://github.com/LLNL/zfp/archive/0.5.5.tar.gz
build:
    number: 4
    script: source ${RECIPE_DIR}/build_zfpy.sh
    string: py38h36e2a69_4
requirements:
    build:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-aarch64 2.35.1 h339fa7d_0
        - binutils_linux-aarch64 2.35 h0a73b0c_29
        - bzip2 1.0.8 hf897c2e_4
        - c-ares 1.17.1 hb9de7d4_0

        - cmake 3.19.1 h31b9045_0
        - expat 2.2.9 h4c5d2ac_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-aarch64 9.3.0 h5b547fa_17
        - gcc_linux-aarch64 9.3.0 h3f8fa26_29
        - gxx_impl_linux-aarch64 9.3.0 he181498_17
        - gxx_linux-aarch64 9.3.0 h235e3a5_29
        - kernel-headers_linux-aarch64 4.18.0 hca5cc2b_10
        - krb5 1.17.2 he08ec14_0
        - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.35.1 h36823c2_0
        - libcurl 7.71.1 hcdd3856_8
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 he28a2e2_2
        - libev 4.33 h516909a_1
        - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 9.3.0 h2e979a9_17
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h8cfc5f6_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_5
        - libstdcxx-devel_linux-aarch64 9.3.0 h96f9e0b_17
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h7a64470_17
        - libuv 1.40.0 h309ac5b_0
        - make 4.3 h309ac5b_1
        - ncurses 6.2 h7fd3ca4_4
        - openssl 1.1.1h h2923d19_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h516909a_1001
        - sysroot_linux-aarch64 2.17 h4744778_10
        - tk 8.6.10 he2b207e_1
        - xz 5.2.5 h6dd45c4_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1009
    host:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - ca-certificates 2020.12.5 h4fd8a4c_0
        - cython 0.29.21 py38h0d71b83_1
        - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.35.1 h36823c2_0
        - libblas 3.9.0 3_openblas
        - libcblas 3.9.0 3_openblas
        - libffi 3.3 h884eca8_2
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libgfortran-ng 9.3.0 h51dc86a_17
        - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h51dc86a_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - liblapack 3.9.0 3_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.12 pthreads_h4812303_1
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h7a64470_17
        - ncurses 6.2 h7fd3ca4_4
        - numpy 1.16.5 py38h348b51c_1
        - openssl 1.1.1h h2923d19_0
        - python 3.8.6 h3bd6a85_1_cpython
        - python_abi 3.8 1_cp38
        - readline 8.0 h607064a_2
        - sqlite 3.34.0 h43e6a2a_0
        - tk 8.6.10 he2b207e_1
        - xz 5.2.5 h6dd45c4_1
        - zfp 0.5.5 h01db608_4
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1009
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=9.3.0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=9.3.0
        - numpy >=1.16.5,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.8,<3.9.0a0
        - python_abi 3.8.* *_cp38
        - zfp 0.5.5 h01db608_4
test:
    imports:
        - zfpy
about:
    description: 'zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays

        that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also

        supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data,

        e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and

        from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes

        Python and Fortran bindings.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/LLNL/zfp
    doc_url: http://zfp.readthedocs.io/en/release0.5.5/
    home: https://computation.llnl.gov/projects/floating-point-compression
    license: BSD-3-Clause
    license_family: BSD
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: Library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput
        read and write random access
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - GarrettDMorrison
        - ToreAad
        - hmaarrfk
        - kmpaul
        - lindstro
